title: Berlin Correspondent (1942) - Dana Andrews
description:
Format: AVI
Language: English
Runtime: 69 mins
Resolution: 640 x 480
Overall Bit rate: 2204 Kbps
Audio Codec: MP3


In 1941 the American radio correspondent Bill Roberts sends out valuable espionage information during his broadcasts from Berlin despite the vigilance of Nazi censors. Realizing that someone must be giving Bill the information, Gestapo colonel Carl von Rau details various agents to follow the American, but Bill eludes them all. Von Rau then assigns his fiancee, Karen Hauen, to investigate Bill, even though she has never done spy work before. Karen succeeds in getting Bill to ask her to his apartment for dinner and there discovers that the information he receives is written in invisible ink on the stamps he buys from a local shop. By revealing this information to Captain von Rau she puts not only herself in risk but also the people she loves.


BERLIN CORRESPONDENT, Writers Steve Fisher and Jack Andrews; directed by Eugene Forde and released by Twentieth Century Fox.


Starring: Virginia Gilmore, Dana Andrews, Mona Maris, Martin Kosleck, Sig Ruman, Kurt Katch, Erwin Kalser.
